name: MenuAnchor
desc: A widget used to mark the "anchor" for a set of submenus, defining the rectangle used to position the menu, which can be done either with an explicit location, or with an alignment.

fields.name: controller
fields.desc: An optional controller that allows opening and closing of the menu from other widgets.

fields.name: childFocusNode
fields.desc: The [childFocusNode] attribute is the optional [FocusNode] also associated to the [child] or [builder] widget that opens the menu.

fields.name: style
fields.desc: The [MenuStyle] that defines the visual attributes of the menu bar.

fields.name: alignmentOffset
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.MenuAnchor.alignmentOffset} The offset of the menu relative to the alignment origin determined by [MenuStyle.alignment] on the [style] attribute and the ambient [Directionality].

fields.name: layerLink
fields.desc: An optional [LayerLink] to attach the menu to the widget that this [MenuAnchor] surrounds.

fields.name: anchorTapClosesMenu
fields.desc: Whether the menus will be closed if the anchor area is tapped.

fields.name: consumeOutsideTap
fields.desc: Whether or not a tap event that closes the menu will be permitted to continue on to the gesture arena.

fields.name: onOpen
fields.desc: A callback that is invoked when the menu is opened.

fields.name: onClose
fields.desc: A callback that is invoked when the menu is closed.

fields.name: crossAxisUnconstrained
fields.desc: Determine if the menu panel can be wrapped by a [UnconstrainedBox] which allows the panel to render at its "natural" size.

fields.name: menuChildren
fields.desc: A list of children containing the menu items that are the contents of the menu surrounded by this [MenuAnchor].

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The optional child to be passed to the [builder].
